channel.title: Jet Li's FEARLESS
channel.description:
Jet Li's FEARLESS
[img]http://i.imdb.com/images/showtimes/90.gif[/img]
[i]"This is the first martial arts film that I enjoyed very much. It has a very strong plot which is also based on a true story about an martial arts master, Huo Yuan Jia and together with great actors and actresses, a masterpiece is presented. As an Asian, I have already seen too much martial arts movie, however this one stuns me with the story and acting as I have mentioned above, but as well as their visual effects, every movement is shown clearly, one would find their heart beating hard as the fight is going on, the music in the film also fits perfectly with the film.
I have to mention that this film is quite Hollywood standard and I believe it is because Jet Li had already learn a few elements to make a good Hollywood film when he was filming some Hollywood films a few years back. As Jet Li has said, this will be his last martial arts movie and wants to make it a good one, I think he has already fulfilled his dreams, because this is a truly Jet Li movie and I think a lot of people would like this film."[/i] [right]- Tsang Chun Kit[/right]
This movie was a lot of fun and keeps you on edge most of the time. The martial arts are just so fantastic. Anybody would enjoy this film. This movie is rated PG-13, but who really cares about ratings. Just go and enjoy the movie. Ratings are just a way of keeping you ignorant of the real world. :) Enjoy the movie.
To get the full effect of this movie, don't download it. It's well worth the 8 bucks I paid for this movie.

bullzeye:

no more Jet Li martial arts films T-T.

I loved Jet Li’s other movie, The One. That one was so good. It was SciFi and all marcial arts. So much fun!
